title: Good Luck Girl!
resume: Good Luck Girl!, known in Japan as Binbō-gami ga!, is a Japanese comedy manga series by Yoshiaki Sukeno was serialized in Shueisha's Jump Square magazine between the July 2008 and August 2013 issues. An anime adaptation by Sunrise aired in Japan between July 4 and September 26, 2012.
